text: 1.7: Ru 24.49; FG 1.8; Ro 8.15Ndu kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme won Ŋinan nza nɨɨŋgi, ana rɨrɨvar nza ndɨɨi Ŋina fhuvara. Ana ŋkasŋkar nza ndɨɨi Ŋina ma. Ana nza mbuim, nza guigira wari won ndavir harigi ntɨɨri ga ndɨɨv, ana vhɨra nzan kurkurigim, nza tuituigia piigiap, ana ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋra zɨn ŋgɨp, tɨvir vhuuiŋra muunga.
